mapper.select: select max(s.create_time), shop_id from tb_order as s GROUP BY shop_id

SELECT s.order_sn FROM tb_order AS s LEFT JOIN tb_escrow_info AS t ON s.order_sn = t.order_sn left join (select order_sn,status from tb_order_status_push where (order_sn, create_time) in (select order_sn, max(create_time) from tb_order_status_push group by order_sn)) as p on s.order_sn = p.order_sn WHERE s.shop_id = #{shopId} AND t.order_sn IS NULL and IFNULL(p.status,s.STATUS) != 'UNPAID';
